text.tspan: What is modular code development for you?
What are your best practices to get readable code?
Modular code is an extra step
regardless of how often I call it
- naming or NAMING or nam_ing or NamIng
- do not optimize if you do not need to
most code is not performance critical
many problems have already been solved
- solve the problems you have now,
do not solve problems you might have in the distant future
